title: Why Japan’s Economy Is at a Tipping Point
description: For 30 years, Japan’s prices were largely at a standstill. Now a weak yen has changed everything. Here’s how consumers and businesses are coping with rising costs, and what it means for the future.  (Source: Bloomberg)
content: For 30 years, Japan’s prices were largely at a standstill. Now a weak yen has changed everything. Here’s how consumers and businesses are coping with rising costs, and what it means for the future.  (Source: Bloomberg)
